name: Pixel Planets: The Multiplayer Galaxy World Builder
name_original: Pixel Planets: The Multiplayer Galaxy World Builder
description:
Build and defend your way through the universe and discover puzzling alien relics!

Reveal exotic technology and generate different alien species to strategically attack other planets. Battle your way through the galaxy in this multiplayer, intergalactic action adventure game.

FEATURES

- MULTIPLAYER ACTION: Fight against other players online and have intergalactic battles.

- BUILD & DEFEND YOUR PLANETS: Colonise and defend a number of planets across the universe.

- CREATE EPIC ALIEN ARMIES: Create alien species, each with a different skill. Play a game of strategy to conquer other planets.

- PLAY ONLINE OR OFFLINE: Play Pixel Planets wherever you are, you don’t need a wifi connection or be online to play.

- ATTACK YOUR FRIENDS: You can choose to attack your friends directly, as well as random strangers.

- CONTROL YOUR ATTACKS: Choose targets for where your army will attack and control your battles.

- PLAN YOUR DEFENCE: You will know when your base is going to be attacked, so you can prepare and plan your defences. No surprise attacks!

- RETRO STYLE GRAPHICS: Fun, retro pixelated art style. It looks amazing and won’t take up much space on your device!

Please note that Pixel Planets is free to play. Some in-game items can be purchased with real money. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device's settings.
